title: Drawing, "Design for a Cup", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, red ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink at lower center: "COUPE;" at lower right: "J.P./36/1." at center right: "TUBES;" in graphite at top line of base: "X;" at upper left: "5h lundi. mardi."
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Cup drawn in elevation decorated on each side with an applied flange comprised of four tubes. Raised on a trapezoidal base drawn in red ink probably to be executed in wood.
Puiforcat collection contains archival photograph, Box 7, Folder 19, "Cups, 9000 series" # 9115.
Puiforcat Fabrication #: 9115, Coupe; 4 ailettes; 4 tube pied bois conique
